summary.testFramework: Vitest + React Testing Library + Puppeteer + axe-core (Performance Optimized)
enhancedFeatures: Real image save and validation testing
Parallel test execution with thread pools

testTypes.unit: React component tests with accessibility validation (fast execution)
testTypes.api: Express API tests with supertest and optimized mocking
testTypes.integration: Real OpenAI API integration tests (performance mode)
testTypes.accessibility: Screen reader and WCAG compliance tests
testTypes.realImages: Actual image generation, save, and validation testing

features: Form validation and user input handling (performance optimized)
API endpoint testing with optimized mocking and real API calls
Mobile responsiveness and accessibility (fast viewport testing)
Error handling and edge cases (quick response validation)
Screen reader compatibility and ARIA compliance
Real OpenAI API prompt refinement validation
Actual image file generation, download, and validation
PNG format validation and file integrity checking
Performance monitoring with execution time tracking

src/__tests__/app.test.js.description: Main App component tests with accessibility
src/__tests__/app.test.js.coverage: Component rendering, navigation, auth state, WCAG compliance

server/__tests__/api.test.js.coverage: Prompt refinement, image generation, gallery management

server/__tests__/openai-integration.test.coverage: Actual prompt refinement, DALL-E generation, rate limiting

e2e/app.e2e.test.js.coverage: Full user workflows, mobile testing, error scenarios

e2e/accessibility.e2e.test.js.description: Screen reader and accessibility E2E tests
e2e/accessibility.e2e.test.js.coverage: WCAG compliance, keyboard navigation, screen reader compatibility

e2e/gallery-bulk-operations.e2e.test.js.description: Gallery bulk delete operations E2E tests
e2e/gallery-bulk-operations.e2e.test.js.coverage: Checkbox selection, confirmation dialogs, bulk deletion

keyAreas: API prompt refinement with quality phrases
Error handling and content policy compliance

qualityAssurance.accessibility: WCAG 2.1 AA compliance, axe-core validation, screen reader testing
qualityAssurance.performance: Load time <5s, responsive during generation, API response timing
qualityAssurance.security: Input sanitization, Firebase token validation, content policy compliance
qualityAssurance.errorHandling: Network failures, API errors, content policy violations, bulk operations
qualityAssurance.integration: Real OpenAI API testing with rate limiting and quality validation

enhancedFeatures.accessibilityCompliance: WCAG 2.1 AA with axe-core automation (fast execution)
enhancedFeatures.screenReaderSupport: Comprehensive ARIA implementation and live regions
enhancedFeatures.mobileDeviceSupport: iPhone SE, 12, Samsung Galaxy S21, iPad testing (rapid viewport switching)
enhancedFeatures.performanceMonitoring: Comprehensive execution time tracking and benchmarking
enhancedFeatures.parallelExecution: Thread-based parallel test execution for speed
enhancedFeatures.resourceOptimization: Selective asset loading for faster test execution
